title: New Scenterpiece™ Easy Melt Cup System - Change Scents In Seconds!
description: Discover the easiest, no mess wax warmer system ever. Enjoy fast, exceptional home fragrance that's simpler and more fun than ever. - Change fragrances ...

asset.author: YankeeCandleCompany
asset.hookText: Discover the easiest, no mess wax warmer system ever. Enjoy fast, exceptional home fragrance that's simpler and more fun than ever. - Change fragrances ...

transcripts: Discover the world's easiest, most stylish wax melt system, the revolutionary Scenterpiece Easy MeltCup System from Yankee Candle, a beautifully simple way to make any space more inviting. Start with the decorative handcrafted centerpiece Easy MeltCup Warmer. Select an Easy MeltCup in your favorite Yankee candle fragrance. Place it in the warmer. Flip the switch and enjoy. Want a different scent? Just lift one cool-to-the-touch cup out and drop another one in. Enjoying exceptional home fragrance has never been easier. Find this Scenterpiece Easy MeltCup System today at Yankee candle retail stores and online at yankeecandle.com.
